en.title: The SwingFish TradingRoom - where the magic happens, in Realtime, Streamed and Logged
en.summary: to provide proof of concept, trades made live, streamed in Realtime, logged in the Blog and community participants can even interact directly. BS Free, all Gains, all Losses, Guaranteed!

de.title: SwingFish Tradingroom - where the magic happens
de.summary: SwingFish, die Trader und Investoren Gemeinschaft. Keine leeren Versprechungen, klaare regeln, klaare Gewinne, Garantiert!
